Amy,
Have you tried using music (not vocals) playing softly in the backgrou=
nd when you record?  I'm hearing "use music" at the begining when I did a l=
ight noise reduction.  Music really helped me as I was getting my feet off =
the ground.  It recharges you, the room and even helps them form their voic=
e. You'll want to play something soothing and relaxing to you.  This could =
be anything from a guitar solo, classical or any meditation type music.  Wh=
at ever makes you feel good is what you should use. :)
  ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
  From: Amy Swanson 
  To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sat=
urday, July 08, 2006 11:41 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] evp bit



  Frank or an=
yone available?
  Can you clean this up? When i clean it up i can hear some=
thing, but not getting it to where i want it! The background noise is A. me=
 breathing B. A pair of jeans clanging in the dryer! lol


  amy



  http:=
//groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/

  LON3_S7AR  YAHOO MESENGER ID
  _______=
___________________________________________
  Do You Yahoo!?
  Tired of spa=
m? Yahoo! Mail has the best spam protection around 
  http://mail.yahoo.com=
